thread.title: BRIEF-India Aviation Regulator: 8 IndiGo, 3 Go Air Aircraft Affected By Latest Pratt & Whitney Engine Issue

title: BRIEF-India Aviation Regulator: 8 IndiGo, 3 Go Air Aircraft Affected By Latest Pratt & Whitney Engine Issue
text: February 13, 2018 / 2:38 PM / in an hour BRIEF-India Aviation Regulator: 8 IndiGo, 3 Go Air Aircraft Affected By Latest Pratt & Whitney Engine Issue Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 13 (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) Says: * INDIGO AND GO AIR HAVE 8 AND 3 A320NEO RESPECTIVELY WITH ONE AFFECTED PRATT & WHITNEY ENGINE * CONTINUES TO CLOSELY MONITOR OPERATIONS OF THESE AIRCRAFT SO AS TO ENSURE THAT SAFETY IS NOT COMPROMISED * IN TOUCH WITH AIRBUS AND EUROPEAN AVIATION SAFETY REGULATOR * ACTION TAKEN BY AIRBUS, EASA WILL BE REVIEWED TO ENSURE SAFETY OF AIRCRAFT OPERATIONS * INDIGO SPOKESMAN SAYS EXPECTS NO DISRUPTION IN OPERATIONS Further company coverage: (Reporting by Aditi Shah)
